did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Duke University. Office of Science and Technology

did.unittitle: Office of Science and Technology records
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Correspondence, scientific manuscripts, and other documents related to licensing and patents for scientific discovery.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the University Archives to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the Office of Science and Technology records, ca. 1977-1996, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid derived from MARC record, November 2014

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Office of Science and Technology has set as institutional priorities the advancement of campus-wide initiatives in genomics, computational biology, neural analysis and engineering, photonics and communications, materials sciences and engineering, and environmental sciences and policy.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, scientific manuscripts, and other documents related to licensing and patents for scientific discovery.

note.label: General note
note.p: Unprocessed collection. Cataloged from accession records.
